amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 from being used to pay the salary of any officer or employee of the the Department of Health and Human Services who develops or promulgates regulations or guidance with regard to Exchanges under subtitle D of title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gardner amendment (A128) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 184 (Roll no. 121).
